profile.name: Reza Nasirian
profile.tagline: AI Engineer specializing in LLM-based multi-agent systems and Business Intelligence solutions.
profile.about_text: AI Engineer specializing in LLM-based multi-agent systems and BI solutions. Proficient in data analysis, visualization, and developing intelligent chatbots and dashboards using tools like LangChain, FastAPI, and Python. Strong analytical and communication skills for cross-functional collaboration.

projects.title: Tax Law RAG Chatbot
projects.content: Developed a RAG system focused on Iranian tax laws. Created a chatbot to answer queries from taxpayers and the general public using Qdrant vector store, LangChain, Python, and FastAPI.

projects.title: CubeAgent - Multi-Agent Conversational AI System
projects.content: Designed and developed a multi-agent framework enabling conversational interaction with structured data using LLMs. Implemented specialized agents for data analysis, query generation (MDX), and visualization.

experience.title: AI Engineer | LLM Agents
experience.description: Built a multi-agent system for conversational data interaction and analysis. Developed specialized agents for data analysis and visualization using LangChain. Implemented real-time communication and modular orchestration.

experience.title: Business Intelligence Developer
experience.description: Composed complex queries and extracted report data to support business intelligence efforts. Designed and developed interactive BI dashboards using Dundas BI and JavaScript.

experience.title: Junior Business Intelligence Developer
experience.description: Developed backend API queries to efficiently retrieve data for reporting. Created an API generator tool for easy API generation from arbitrary database tables.

services.title: AI & ML Solutions
services.description: Development of conversational AI systems, data analysis, and machine learning solutions tailored to your business needs.

services.title: Business Intelligence
services.description: Interactive BI dashboards and reporting solutions using tools like Dundas BI, SQL, and Python.

services.title: Custom Web Development
services.description: End-to-end development of custom web applications, using modern web technologies like Django, and FastAPI.
